name: Cubes and Ladders
description:
Interactive fiction tells you the beginning of a story and then leaves it up to you to decide what your character should do next. You issue commands to your character, and the story responds by telling you what happens.

This particular story takes place in the corporate office of Minimax, a struggling electronics company. Your character is a new employee who is about to be called on to explore the office, meet interesting people, and solve puzzles. Your role is to guide the character and make decisions. There are multiple story endings possible. You can win the game by solving all the puzzles, or you could end up fired, or even dead.
